enhanced_by.reason: The clear method operates on the list initialized by the TailList constructor, making it essential to set up the list state before testing clear.
Adding elements to the list before clearing it can help verify that the clear method correctly removes all elements from the specified start point.
The clear method relies on the size of the list to determine how many elements to remove, making it important to verify the list size before and after the clear operation.
The clear method internally calls the remove method, so testing the remove method before clear can help ensure that the clear method works correctly.
